frontmatter.title: The Oak Compiler
frontmatter.description: I've written an alternative to the C programming language. This is how it works, and what I've learned.

frontmatter.title: The Importance of Beauty
frontmatter.description: While the practical aspect of an application is incredibly important, I believe that the presentation is significantly more important.

frontmatter.title: Combinator Compilers
frontmatter.description: A brief exploration of combinator compilers.

frontmatter.title: Writing a Compiler with Honeycomb
frontmatter.description: After reading about parser combinator libraries, I started to write my own! I eventually got it into a working state, and published it on crates.io under the name `honeycomb`.
